function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Fluctuating demands for medical equipment","Impact":"Shortage of necessary medical equipment","Mitigation":"Implement flexible manufacturing systems","Technologies":"IoT, smart inventory management systems, autonomous inventory management systems","People":"Healthcare providers, patients","Owner":"Manufacturers, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Behavioral shifts in individuals and organizations","Impact":"Changes in societal and economic patterns, potential for increased spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implement IoT adoption for effective monitoring and management","Technologies":"IoT, intelligent collaborative frameworks","People":"General population, organizations","Owner":"Technology developers, organizations"}]}
